scenario_text.value: Ugh...
T...Takuma... Are you...okay?

Dammit... What the hell just happened? It all
went down so fast...
I can’t believe how strong she was!

Oww! I think Aoi just took us all down in
a single blow...

This can’t be happening... How could she do
that?

Phew... Anyway, at least we know one thing
now.
Yes... Though I hate to admit it, Aoi has...
Aoi has...become...our enemy?

Why? I’m not your enemy. I only wish to guide
you, to correct your mistakes. Besides...

...since this was your first offense, I went
a little easy on you.

Everyone makes mistakes. That’s why I’m
giving you a second chance.

Otherwise how will you ever learn where you
went wrong? How will you do better?

You understand now, don’t you? If you make
a mistake again...
I will NOT accept another failure!

Got it? If you keep acting selfish, I’ll have
to be more strict.

Because I won’t have any bad kids in the
peaceful paradise I’m guiding you towards.

I don’t like you like this, Aoi! Please, come
to your senses!
Oh dear...

Did you say something, Miu? That would be
your second offense, you know!
Stop it, stupid! Keep your mouth shut!

Good job, Kaito. Siblings should get along.
You see the importance of harmony, don’t you?

(She makes that sound like a threat... I’m
actually scared speechless!)

Hehe... There, nice and quiet. What good boys
and girls.
Now then! I must go. I can feel his power...
He’s not far now... The one who killed Saki!
She vanished...
Umm... What the hell just happened?
You’re asking me?!

(I don’t think any of us have any clue what’s
going on anymore...)

But if we don’t act fast, something horrible
is gonna happen... I know that much.
Where did Aoi go?

She’s probably heading to the Master. She
wants his overwhelming power.
And do you know where the Master is?

Now that you mention it, you did say you
knew where Miyuki was!

Yes. The shrine. Both the Master and Miyuki
can be found under the shrine.

The way she was talking, I doubt Aoi will
spare Miyuki. This is not good.
But if she doesn’t spare Miyuki...

Doesn’t that mean we’ll lose our only way
back to our world?!
What? No!

We can’t let her do this! We have to go after
Plutomon, NOW!
Right...

(We’re hardly prepared for this...but it
looks like it’s time for the final battle.)
This could be our last fight, everyone.

We can’t rescue Miyuki unless we stop
Plutomon first!

Oh, wait! What about Jijimon and the little
ones? We can’t just leave them alone, can we?

True... Maybe we should head back to the
school and get organized?

That might be a good idea. We need to get our
mental state in order as well.
We’d better check on the kids, too.

Right! What do you think, Takuma? Sound like
a plan?
Yeah, sure... Let’s do that.
(Honestly, I’m confused.)

(How are we gonna deal with Aoi now that
she’s turned against us?)

(What’ll happen the next time we meet? Can we
even beat Plutomon—I mean, Aoi?)
(What the heck should we do?!)
